author: billbarker
msg: Support for saving session on Context reloading.

This version maximizes code re-use, at the expense of a some-what dirty lifecycle.  However, since the current implementation notifies lifecycle events from the Facade, it is still valid from the point of view of the Servlet Spec.

author: billbarker
msg: Session reloading support on Context reload.

author: billbarker
msg: Also synchronized reloading, to prevent a double-adding bug.

author: billbarker
msg: API changes to allow for saving session across Context reloading.
